{{Lang|'''Yata Kouki'''|ja=矢田幸喜|ja_rm=Yata Kouki}} is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Inazuma City]], [[Inazuma]]. He can be found at the [[Tenryou Commission]] headquarters.

===Appearance===
Yata Kouki wears a standard uniform modeled from the {{Lang|''ashigaru''|ja=足軽}} of feudal Japan. He wears a purple-gray ''shitagi'', lavender ''kobakama'', white socks, and ''waraji'' sandals. His eggplant-colored armor with pale gold accents consists of ''dou'' (breastplate) with the [[Inazuma Shogunate]]'s crest, ''kote'' (armored sleeves), ''haidate'' (thigh guards), and ''sune-ate'' (greaves). He is also wearing a {{Lang|''jingasa''|ja=陣笠}} with the crest of the Inazuma Shogunate. He is equipped with a ''juumonji yari'' (cross-shaped spear), whose shaft is lavender colored, and contains the Shogunate crest under the spearhead.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yata Kouki:''' Hello! Glory to the Shogun and her everlasting...
:'''Yata Kouki:''' Wait, who are you? What is your business here?
:{{DIcon}} I'm just passing through.
::'''Yata Kouki:''' Really?
::'''Yata Kouki:''' Hmm... You weren't doing anything suspicious earlier, that's for sure. You may pass.
::'''Yata Kouki:''' The exit's that way, so don't wander around. The headquarters of the [[Tenryou Commission]] can be a confusing place, and you don't want to get "lost."
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Yata Kouki:''' I'm warning you. Don't you get any wicked ideas!
{{Dialogue End}}

==Event Dialogue==
===Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival===
====Dialogue Set #1====
''Available before completing [[As Though Caught in a Dream]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yata Kouki:''' Glory to the Shogun and her everlasting reign. Greetings. I have been assigned as a guard for the [[Mikawa Flower Festival]]. [[Kujou Sara|Madam Kujou]] has given orders for extra caution in this matter of grave importance.
:'''Yata Kouki:''' ...Well, I say that, but would anyone dare try anything funny while you're around?
{{Dialogue End}}

====Dialogue Set #2====
''Available between completing [[As Though Caught in a Dream]] and [[As Though Beholding Illusions]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yata Kouki:''' Madam Kujou wants us to act normally and keep a discrete vigil... But what, precisely, counts as "normal?" One-hundred-twenty-percent vigilance, as per usual?
{{Dialogue End}}

====Dialogue Set #3====
''Available after completing [[As Though Beholding Illusions]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yata Kouki:''' Alright, Tenryou Commission, let's give this a hundred twenty percent! We shan't fail Madam Kujou Sara this time!
{{Dialogue End}}
